mapper.select: select * from `review` where user_id = #{userId} order by `created_date` desc LIMIT #{startRow}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM `review` WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT r.* FROM review r JOIN ( SELECT plan_id, MAX(view_count) AS max_view_count FROM review GROUP BY plan_id) AS grouped_reviews ON r.plan_id = grouped_reviews.plan_id AND r.view_count = grouped_reviews.max_view_count ORDER BY r.view_count DESC LIMIT 8;
